Getting started

1

Read the platform GUIDE

First things first. Start your way through DEVON by reading the DEVON4j Platform Guide

2

View the demo tutorial

There is currently one rather technical demo, simulating a few use cases of a restaurant management application

3

Setup the develop enviroment

The DEVON IDE setup guide will guide you how to get your development environment up and running.

4

Get the code

Once you are able to code applications with DEVON support you surely want to take a peek to the technology underneath and be able to customize for your needs.The code is hosted on Github, here are the main repositories

5

Help making DEVON even better

Remember this is a joint effort and you are welcome to contribute.
